{{Terminology Infobox
|type         = Item Types
}}
'''Event Items''' are items that are only obtainable during the period of particular in-game [[events]]. Most of them will disappear from the [[Inventory]] after the event concludes.

Types of Event Items include [[Gadgets]], Event Currency, and Crafting Materials.
